column2: Nucor sees lower second-quarter earnings June 13 Steelmaker Nucor Corp said on Thursday that it expects earnings to fall in the second quarter compared with a year earlier
column3: and that its steel mills' operating performance has deteriorated from the first quarter of 2013.

column2: Southwest Air sees key revenue measure weakening in 2nd quarter June 13 Southwest Airlines Co said it expects an important revenue measure to decline in the second quarter
column3: saying it is having to work harder to stimulate traffic.

column2: UPDATE 1-EU regulators put Visa Europe's antitrust concessions to rivals BRUSSELS
column3: June 13 EU regulators asked Visa Europe's customers and rivals to assess its offer to cap inter-bank credit card fees at the same level as competitor MasterCard
column4: a concession intended to end an antitrust investigation and avoid a possible fine.
